description:
Welcome to my 2nd course on " 2 - Concepts of Statistics for beginners step by step"

This course will cover the complete understanding of Statistics . In this course students will learn the numerically and theoratically concepts of Statistics . What is mean , median and mode? and their different methods of calculation .

Concepts of Geometric mean , Harmonic mean and Weighted mean .

We will cover

  • How to calculate numericals of statistics
  • Use advanced Statistic techniques .
  • Learn the theoratically and numerically concepts of statistics
  • Charts and its types , Averages,Properties of Arithmetic mean , quartiles and box plot
  • Average and its types , Trimmed and winsorized mean , and quartiles deciles and percentiles
  • Box plot and detailed box plot , Stem and leaf display and emperical relationship between mean median and mode
  • Properties of Arithmetic mean etc etc

In this course I used different types of formulas, schedules and graphs . So that students can understand easily everything.

Hence this course will provide the easy methods to solve numerically Statistics.
title: 2 - Concepts of Statistics For Beginner level to advance
